titleStmt.title: A supplement to Dr. Du Moulin, treating of the likeliest means to remove hirelings out of the Church of England With a brief vindication of Mr. Rich. Baxter. By J.M.
titleStmt.author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.

publicationStmt.date: printed in the Year M DC LXXX. [1680]

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Means to remove hirelings out of the Church.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
